function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of social distancing in urban farming activities","Impact":"Increase in the spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Enforce strict social distancing guidelines and provide training on safe practices","Technologies":"Remote monitoring and automation to minimize human interaction","People":"Urban farmers, residents, agricultural workers","Owner":"Local governments, urban planning authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate pandemic-resilient indicators in building assessment systems","Impact":"Vulnerability to disease outbreaks in built environments","Mitigation":"Integration of pandemic-resilient indicators in assessment systems, regular updates to incorporate new information","Technologies":"Data analytics for tracking disease indicators, sensor systems for monitoring air quality and sanitation","People":"Building owners, architects, developers","Owner":"Sustainability certification organizations, government regulatory bodies"}]}
